name: Boing (The New Dimension)
overview: Boing is a game developed and released by Richard Bayliss and graphics by his brother, Philip on Richard's TND label in 1997. One of the earliest games on the label. The object of this game is to safely guide Blobbo across the bridge without getting crushed by a rolling barrel. To do this, you will need to press the fire button on the joystick plugged into port #1. This will not be an easy task because you have to test your reaction skills. If you press the button too soon or too late, then you're finished. However, if you press fire at the correct time, the player will be able to jump over the barrel and cross the bridge. You will also score a bonus of 10 points. After the end of each stage, the barrel speeds up.
